content.rendered:
Directed by Pradeep Ranganathan

Written by Pradeep Ranganathan

Cast Jayam Ravi (Ravi). Kajal Aggarwal (Ritika Mohan). Yogi Babu (Mani). K.S. Ravikumar (MLA Dharmaraj). Samyuktha Hegde (Nikitha Krishnamurthy). Aadukalam Naren (Ravi’s Father). Ponnambalam (Gaaja). Vinodhini Vaidynathan (Dharmaraj’s Wife). Snehan (Lusty King (Special Appearance)). Rj Ananthi (Divya Mani). Sha Ra (Dr. Thyagesh). Varun Kamal (Nagaraj (as Varun)). Ramar (Dharmaraj’s Sidekick). Bijili Ramesh (Dharmaraj’s Watchman). Manikandan Vaidhyanathan (Loan Collection Agent). Mannai Sathik (Ravi’s Neighbour). Fahad Nasar (Fahad) .Mozammel Hoshen Chowdhury. Kavita Radheshyam (Bajji Kada Shop Owner). Pradeep Ranganathan (Auto Driver Joseph). Ruel Dausan Varandani (Director of Choreography (credit only))

Languages Tamil

Producers K. Ashwin Kumar

Production Goldmines Telefilm. Vels Film International
